title: GitHub Git Operations Are Down
excerpt: GitHub's Status Page - Incident with Git Operations.
text: Incident with Git Operations Resolved On January 13, 2025, between 23:35 UTC and 00:24 UTC all Git operations were unavailable due to a configuration change causing our internal load balancer to drop requests between services that Git relies upon.We mitigated the incident by rolling back the configuration change.We are improving our monitoring and deployment practices to reduce our time to detection and automated mitigation for issues like this in the future. Posted Jan 14, 2025 - 00:28 UTC Update We've identified a cause of degraded git operations, which may affect other GitHub services that rely upon git. We're working to remediate. Posted Jan 14, 2025 - 00:15 UTC Update Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate. Posted Jan 13, 2025 - 23:57 UTC Update Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate. Posted Jan 13, 2025 - 23:46 UTC Investigating We are investigating reports of degraded availability for Git Operations Posted Jan 13, 2025 - 23:44 UTC This incident affected: Git Operations, Actions, and Pages.
html:
Incident with Git Operations

Resolved

On January 13, 2025, between 23:35 UTC and 00:24 UTC all Git operations were unavailable due to a configuration change causing our internal load balancer to drop requests between services that Git relies upon.

We mitigated the incident by rolling back the configuration change.

We are improving our monitoring and deployment practices to reduce our time to detection and automated mitigation for issues like this in the future.

Posted Jan 14, 2025 - 00:28 UTC

Update

We've identified a cause of degraded git operations, which may affect other GitHub services that rely upon git. We're working to remediate.

Posted Jan 14, 2025 - 00:15 UTC

Update

Actions is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Posted Jan 13, 2025 - 23:57 UTC

Update

Pages is experiencing degraded performance. We are continuing to investigate.

Posted Jan 13, 2025 - 23:46 UTC

Investigating

We are investigating reports of degraded availability for Git Operations

Posted Jan 13, 2025 - 23:44 UTC

This incident affected: Git Operations, Actions, and Pages.
